text: وَلَقَدۡ أَخَذۡنَٰهُم بِٱلۡعَذَابِ فَمَا ٱسۡتَكَانُواْ لِرَبِّهِمۡ وَمَا يَتَضَرَّعُونَ

translation.en: And We had gripped them with suffering [as a warning], but they did not yield to their Lord, nor did they humbly supplicate, [and will continue thus]
translation.id: (Dan sungguh Kami telah menimpakan siksaan kepada mereka,555) tetapi mereka tidak mau tunduk kepada Tuhannya, dan (juga) tidak merendahkan diri
